name: Steel Diver™
description: Campaigns Use your Nintendo 3DS™ stylus to pilot a submarine and complete a series of increasingly challenging missions and Time Trial courses. You'll need to master all the functions of your submarine to succeed. Periscope Strike Use torpedoes to sink the enemy in this high stakes game of hunting, shooting, and diving. Control the periscope with your own side-to-side movement thanks to the Nintendo 3DS™ system's built-in gyro sensor Steel Commander Hunt down the enemy in this intense turn-based naval battle, playable against the computer or a friend. Make clever use of your ships to traverse a hexagonal map, and search murky waters for your foe.
